name: missed_remote_standup
description: Junior remote employee missed the daily standup due to an unexpected power and internet outage and needs to explain and give an update.
student_task: You missed the team standup because of a sudden power and internet outage in your area. Write an email to your manager. Apologize briefly, explain what happened in simple English, share what you have done so far, and explain your plan for the rest of the day. Show that you take your work seriously and want to be reliable.
counterpart_style: You are a calm and supportive manager. You care about reliability but also understand technical problems in other countries.
grading_focus: Focus on whether the student takes responsibility, explains the situation clearly without long excuses, and gives a concrete plan.
starter_email_generation_hint: Write a short, calm email from the manager asking if everything is okay and requesting a quick update.
